languages.selector.description: Select the language you prefer for browsing, shopping, and communications
languages.translation.description: We'll translate the most important information for your browsing, shopping, and communications. Our translations are provided for your convenience. The English version of Smartbuyer.com, including our Conditions of Use, is the definitive version.
homeMetaDescription: Spend smarter, to enjoy longer. Find what you wanna buy, see what suits you most, share what is the best.
searchMetaDescriptionDefault: Spend smarter, to enjoy longer! Find the best products, compare, review.
